00037     template <typename LHS, typename RHS, typename OP>
00038     class scalar_expression
00039     {
00040         typedef typename LHS::value_type          DummyType; //Visual C++ 2005 does not allow to write LHS::value_type::value_type
00041       public:
00042         typedef typename DummyType::value_type    ScalarType;
00043         
00044         scalar_expression(LHS & lhs, RHS & rhs) : _lhs(lhs), _rhs(rhs) {}
00045         
00047         LHS & get_lhs() const { return _lhs; }
00049         RHS & get_rhs() const { return _rhs; }
00050 
00052         operator ScalarType () const
00053         {
00054           viennacl::scalar<ScalarType> temp;
00055           temp = *this;
00056           return temp;
00057         }
00058 
00059       private:
00060         LHS & _lhs;
00061         RHS & _rhs;
00062     };
00063     
00071     template<class TYPE>
00072     class scalar
00073     {
00074     public:
00076       typedef typename viennacl::tools::CHECK_SCALAR_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENT<TYPE>::ResultType   value_type;
00077       
00079       scalar()
00080       {
00081         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::init(); 
00082         _val = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(TYPE));
00083       }
00085       scalar(TYPE val)
00086       {
00087         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::init(); 
00088         _val = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(TYPE), &val);
00089       }
00090 
00092       template <typename T1, typename T2, typename OP>
00093       scalar(scalar_expression<T1, T2, OP> const & proxy)
00094       {
00095         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::init(); 
00096         _val = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(TYPE));
00097         *this = proxy;
00098       }
00099 
00100       //copy constructor
00102       scalar(const scalar & other) : _val(viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, sizeof(TYPE)))
00103       {
00104         //copy value:
00105         cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), other.handle(), handle(), 0, 0, sizeof(TYPE), 0, NULL, NULL);
00106         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00107       }
00108 
00110       operator TYPE() const
00111       {
00112         TYPE tmp;
00113         cl_int err;
00114         err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), _val, CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(TYPE), &tmp, 0, NULL, NULL);
00115         assert(err == CL_SUCCESS);
00116         viennacl::ocl::finish();
00117         return tmp;
00118       } 
00119       
00121       scalar<TYPE> & operator= (vector_entry_proxy<TYPE> const & other)
00122       {
00123         //copy value:
00124         cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), handle(), other.handle(), 0, other.index(), sizeof(TYPE), 0, NULL, NULL);
00125         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00126         return *this;
00127       }
00128 
00130       scalar<TYPE> & operator= (scalar<TYPE> const & other)
00131       {
00132         //copy value:
00133         cl_int err = clEnqueueCopyBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), other.handle(), handle(), 0, 0, sizeof(TYPE), 0, NULL, NULL);
00134         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00135         
00136         return *this;
00137       }
00138 
00140       template <typename T1, typename T2>
00141       scalar<TYPE> & operator= (scalar_expression<T1, T2, op_inner_prod> const & proxy)
00142       {
00143         viennacl::linalg::inner_prod_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), proxy.get_rhs(), *this);
00144         return *this;
00145       }
00146 
00148       template <typename T1, typename T2>
00149       scalar<TYPE> & operator= (scalar_expression<T1, T2, op_norm_2> const & proxy)
00150       {
00151         viennacl::linalg::norm_2_impl(proxy.get_lhs(), *this);
00152         return *this;
00153       }

00156       scalar<TYPE> & operator += (scalar<TYPE> const & other)
00157       {
00158         unsigned int pos = 0;
00159         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::inplace_add.setArgument(pos++, _val);
00160         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::inplace_add.setArgument(pos++, other._val);
00161 
00162         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::inplace_add.start1D(1,1);  //one thread is enough for such a trivial operation
00163         
00164         return *this;
00165       }
00167       scalar<TYPE> & operator += (TYPE other)
00168       {
00169         unsigned int pos = 0;
00170         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::cpu_inplace_add.setArgument(pos++, _val);
00171         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::cpu_inplace_add.setArgument(pos++, other);
00172 
00173         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::cpu_inplace_add.start1D(1,1);  //one thread is enough for such a trivial operation
00174         
00175         return *this;
00176       }

00253       scalar<TYPE> operator + (scalar<TYPE> const & other)
00254       {
00255         scalar<TYPE> result;
00256         unsigned int pos = 0;
00257         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::add.setArgument(pos++, _val);
00258         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::add.setArgument(pos++, other._val);
00259         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::add.setArgument(pos++, result.handle());
00260 
00261         viennacl::linalg::kernels::scalar<TYPE, 1>::add.start1D(1,1);  //one thread is enough for such a trivial operation
00262         return result;
00263       }

00412       const viennacl::ocl::handle<cl_mem> & handle() const { return _val; }

00419     //stream operators:
00421     template<class SCALARTYPE>
00422     std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & s, const scalar<SCALARTYPE> & val)
00423     {
00424       SCALARTYPE temp = val;
00425       s << temp;
00426       return s;
00427     }
00428 
00430     template<class SCALARTYPE>
00431     std::istream & operator>>(std::ostream & s, const scalar<SCALARTYPE> & val)
00432     {
00433       SCALARTYPE temp;
00434       s >> temp;
00435       val = temp;
00436       return s;
00437     }
